description: Type interfaces and concept definitions for the Kairo standard library

interfaces.name: SupportsPointerCast<T>
interfaces.description: Interface for types that support dynamic pointer casting

interfaces.name: Castable<From, To>
interfaces.description: Interface for types that can be cast from one type to another
interfaces.requirements: Has `fn op as(self) -> To` operator or C++ implicit cast operator

interfaces.name: ConvertibleToString<T>
interfaces.description: Interface for types that can be converted to string
interfaces.requirements: Has `fn op as(self) -> string` operator or supports C++ Ostream insertion or C++ implicit conversion to kairo::string

interfaces.name: RangeCompliant<T>
interfaces.description: Interface for types that can be used in range-based iteration
interfaces.requirements: Has `op ++` and `op <` operators for range iteration

interfaces.name: SupportsOStream<T>
interfaces.description: Interface for types that support output streaming
interfaces.requirements: Has `op <<` operator for output streaming or C++ Ostream insertion operator that returns `libcxx::ostream&`

interfaces.name: ClassType<T>
interfaces.description: Interface constraint that requires T to be a class type

interfaces.name: ConstType<T>
interfaces.description: Interface constraint that requires T to be a const type

interfaces.name: ReferenceableType<T>
interfaces.description: Interface constraint that requires T to be referenceable

interfaces.name: RValueReference<T>
interfaces.description: Interface constraint that requires T to be an rvalue reference type
interfaces.requirements: Must be an rvalue reference type

interfaces.name: LValueReference<T>
interfaces.description: Interface constraint that requires T to be an lvalue reference type
interfaces.requirements: Must be an lvalue reference type

interfaces.name: ReferenceType<T>
interfaces.description: Interface constraint that requires T to be a reference type
interfaces.requirements: Must be a reference type (either lvalue or rvalue)

interfaces.name: MoveConstructible<T>
interfaces.description: Interface for types that have a move constructor

interfaces.name: NothrowAssignable<T, Arg>
interfaces.description: Interface for types that have a non-throwing assignment operator

interfaces.name: CopyConstructible<T>
interfaces.description: Interface for types that have a copy constructor
